title: OpenCode Provider fix needed on your main branch
description:
Your main branch (33 commits ahead of origin) has the same OpenCode bug I just fixed.

**The Bug:** RuntimeConfigFromPreset() doesn't set Provider field, causing OpenCode sessions to exit immediately (prompt passed as directory path).

**The Fix:** Cherry-pick commit f587bea4 from fix/opencode-provider-field branch, or merge that branch into your main.

To apply:
  cd /home/ubuntu/gt/gastown/crew/polecatdancers
  git cherry-pick f587bea4

This affects internal/config/agents.go and internal/config/loader.go.

Convoy tracking this: hq-cv-utko2
Related beads: gt-fd0, gt-0sh, gt-gi3

title: Work: Verify OpenCode Mayor session stays running
description:
dispatched_by: mayor

Auto-created convoy tracking gt-db9
close_reason: Fixed OpenCode agent configuration. Created custom 'opencode' agent and set as default in ~/.config/opencode/opencode.json. OpenCode sessions will now use the 'opencode' agent instead of defaulting to 'claude'.

comments.author: mayor
comments.text:
Fixed OpenCode agent configuration:
- Created custom 'opencode' agent in ~/.config/opencode/opencode.json
- Set it as default_agent so OpenCode sessions use it automatically
- Verified agent exists with 'opencode agent list'
- Config now has both 'opencode' (custom, default) and 'build' (built-in) agents

The fix ensures that when Gas Town spawns OpenCode sessions for polecats, they will use the 'opencode' agent by default instead of falling back to 'claude'.
